name: Two of us
description:
* caution! Two Xbox One or similar controllers are required for the gameplay.*

Two of us is the cooperative multi-puzzle game that aim puzzle complete by working together. Shoot the alien come from far galaxy to invade earth! A lot of parts are deployed randomly in spaceship to be the game stage. Player’s goal is to finalize missile by combining their parts like a puzzle,and shoot alien’s battleship!



Do you like cute girl character?? The game that can manipulate these cute characters isn’t so many! Many player should be satisfied with this character design. We intend to update the factor so that bring out the charm of character from now on!
